DOC.brief_summary: The aim study define optimal rehabilitation client full thickness rotator cuff reconstruction , two goal : 1 . Finding optimal physical therapy dosage enhance post-operative outcome shoulder pain , shoulder joint range motion , shoulder muscle strength , upper extremity function ; 2 . Finding effect aquatic physical therapy enhance post-operative outcome .
DOC.detailed_description: Measurement device : Biodex : Biodex system muscle strength test rehabilitation instrument use test rehabilitation service shoulder , elbow , wrist , hip , knee ankle . Modes operation exercise test include isokinetic , passive , isometric , isotonic , reactive eccentric . Patients tested muscle performance require number repetition require mode . The muscle performance measure calculating average peak torque ( Nm ) analyze across group patient . Goniometer : A manual devise use measure joint range motion . Visual Analogue Scale : A scale 0 10 , 0 pain , 10 severe pain . Measurement procedure : All subject post surgery test prior 6 week follow surgery : Shoulder Pain measure use visual analog scale . Shoulder Range motion measure use standard goniometer . Shoulder Muscle performance measure use Biodex .
